results.title: Ithal Damat = Imported groom
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Huseyin Duman and ACMI
results.brief_description: Huseyin Damat left Turkey for Australia to meet and marry his wife. Although he was sad to leave his family behind, his journey here was an eventful one, especially when he discovered he was on the same flight as Swedish super group ABBA.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Huseyin Duman and ACMI

results.title: Let's not say goodbye
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
results.brief_description: The destruction of Australia’s bushland and forests threatens already endangered species. Members of the Theatre in Education and the Real Fantasy Theatre Company take a humorous look at this serious problem.

results.title: Show me English: enrolling in class [episode 8]
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Ministry of Education, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Jeff Spencer
results.brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. Tina decides to enrol in English classes following a successful association with Sue, her home tutor. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.

results.title: Show me English: the local council [episode 6]
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Ministry of Education, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Jeff Spencer
results.brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. A problem tree growing outside Tina’s home necessitates the involvement of the local council in reaching a satisfactory solution. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.

results.title: Show me English: a visit to the doctor [episode 5]
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Ministry of Education, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Jeff Spencer
results.brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. On the second visit to the doctor, Tina is given the result of her test and is prescribed medication and given advice on the importance of diet and rest. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.

results.title: Show me English: a visit to hospital [episode 4]
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Ministry of Education, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Jeff Spencer
results.brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants to communicate in everyday situations. The receptionist at a large hospital gives directions to Tina on how to find the Pathology Department. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.
